markdown.markdown: :::{#heading} Research Scientist @ [CyberAgent AI Lab](https://cyberagent.ai/ailab/) Project Assistant Professor @ [Tokyo Metropolitan University](https://tmu.komachi.live/) Visiting Scientist @ [NLU Team, RIKEN AIP](https://aip.riken.jp/labs/goalorient_tech/nat_lang_understand/) ::: :::{.callout-note} - 情報処理学会NL研究会で共著論文「文法誤り訂正におけるメタ評価の再考」が[優秀研究賞](https://sites.google.com/sig-nl.ipsj.or.jp/sig-nl/%E6%8E%88%E8%B3%9E/outstanding?authuser=0#h.19m46cbzp0rr)を受賞しました。 ::: ## Research Interests - Natural Language Processing, Computational Linguistics - NLP for Education & Advertisement, Resource & Evaluation, ## Publications ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Referred 1. Zizheng Zhang, Masato Mita, Mamoru Komachi. ["ClozEx: A Task toward Generation of English Cloze Explanation."](https://aclanthology.org/2023.findings-emnlp.347/) Findings of EMNLP 2023. EMNLP Findings 1. Yusuke Ide, Masato Mita, Adam Nohejl, Hiroki Ouchi, and Taro Watanabe. ["Japanese Lexical Complexity for Non-Native Readers: a New Dataset."](https://aclanthology.org/2023.bea-1.40/) ACL Workshop, BEA 2023. BEA 1. Zizheng Zhang, Masato Mita, Mamoru Komachi. ["Cloze Quality Estimation for Language Assessment."](https://aclanthology.org/2023.findings-eacl.39/) Findings of EACL 2023. EACL Findings 1. Aomi Koyama, Tomoshige Kiyuna, Kenji Kobayashi, Mio Arai, Masato Mita, Teruaki Oka and Mamoru Komachi. ["Construction of an Error-Tagged Evaluation Corpus for Japanese Grammatical Error Correction."](https://www.jstage.jst.go.jp/article/jnlp/30/2/30_330/_article/-char/ja) Journal of Natural Language Processing (in Japanese) Vol.30, No.2. JNLP 1. Yujin Takahashi, Masahiro Kaneko, Masato Mita, Mamoru Komachi. ["ProQE: Proficiency-wise Quality Estimation dataset for Grammatical Error Correction"](https://aclanthology.org/2022.lrec-1.644/) Proceedings of the LREC 2022. LREC 1. Daisuke Suzuki, Yujin Takahashi, Ikumi Yamashita, Taichi Aida, Tosho Hirasawa, Michitaka Nakatsuji, Masato Mita, Mamoru Komachi. ["Construction of a Quality Estimation Dataset for Automatic Evaluation of Japanese Grammatical Error Correction."](https://aclanthology.org/2022.lrec-1.596/) Proceedings of the LREC 2022. LREC 1. Hongfei Wang, Michiki Kurosawa, Satoru Katsumata, Masato Mita, Mamoru Komachi. ["Chinese Grammatical Error Correction Using Pre-trained Models and Pseudo Data."](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3570209) Transactions on Asian and Low-Resource Language Information Processing. TALIP 1. Ikumi Yamashita, Masahiro Kaneko, Masato Mita, Satoru Katsumata, Aizhan Imankulova, Mamoru Komachi. ["Grammatical Error Correction with Pre-trained Model and Multilingual Learner Corpus for Cross-lingual Transfer Learning."](https://www.jstage.jst.go.jp/article/jnlp/29/2/29_314/_article/-char/ja/) Journal of Natural Language Processing (in Japanese) Vol.29, No.2. JNLP 1. Ryo Nagata, Masato Hagiwara, Kazuaki Hanawa, Masato Mita, Artem Chernodub, Olena Nahorna. ["Shared Task on Feedback Comment Generation for Language Learners."](https://aclanthology.org/2021.inlg-1.35/) Proceedings of the INLG 2021. INLG 1. Masato Mita, Hitomi Yanaka. ["Do Grammatical Error Correction Models Realize Grammatical Generalization?."](https://aclanthology.org/2021.findings-acl.399/) Findings of the ACL-IJCNLP 2021. ACL Findings 1. Ryo Fujii, Masato Mita, Kaori Abe, Kazuaki Hanawa, Makoto Morishita, Jun Suzuki, Kentaro Inui. ["Phenomenon-wise Evaluation Dataset Towards Analyzing Robustness of Machine Translation Models."](https://www.jstage.jst.go.jp/article/jnlp/28/2/28_450/_article/-char/ja/) Journal of Natural Language Processing (in Japanese) Vol.28, No.2. JNLP 1. Masato Mita, Tomoya Mizumoto, Masahiro Kaneko, Ryo Nagata, Kentaro Inui. ["Cross-Sectional Evaluation of Grammatical Error Correction Models."](https://www.jstage.jst.go.jp/article/jnlp/28/1/28_160/_article/-char/ja) Journal of Natural Language Processing (in Japanese) Vol.28, No.1. JNLP 1. Takumi Gotou, Ryo Nagata, Masato Mita, Kazuaki Hanawa. ["Taking the Correction Difficulty into Account in Grammatical Error Correction Evaluation."](https://aclanthology.org/2020.coling-main.188/) COLING 1. Ryo Fujii, Masato Mita, Kaori Abe, Kazuaki Hanawa, Makoto Morishita, Jun Suzuki, Kentaro Inui. ["PheMT: A Phenomenon-wise Dataset for Machine Translation Robustness on User-Generated Contents."](https://aclanthology.org/2020.coling-main.521/) Proceedings of the COLING 2020. COLING 1. Masato Mita, Shun Kiyono, Masahiro Kaneko, Jun Suzuki, Kentaro Inui. ["A Self-Refinement Strategy for Noise Reduction in Grammatical Error Correction."](https://aclanthology.org/2020.findings-emnlp.26/) Findings of the EMNLP 2020. EMNLP Findings 1. Hiroaki Funayama, Shota Sasaki, Yuichiro Matsubayashi, Tomoya Mizumoto, Jun Suzuki, Masato Mita, Kentaro Inui. ["Preventing Critical Scoring Errors in Short Answer Scoring with Confidence Estimation."](https://aclanthology.org/2020.acl-srw.32/) Proceedings of the ACL SRW 2020. ACL SRW 1. Masahiro Kaneko, Masato Mita, Shun Kiyono, Jun Suzuki, Kentaro Inui. ["Can Encoder-decoder Models Benefit from Pre-trained Language Representation in Grammatical Error Correction?."](https://aclanthology.org/2020.acl-main.391/) Proceedings of the ACL 2020. ACL 1. Masato Hagiwara, Masato Mita. ["GitHub Typo Corpus: A Large-Scale Multilingual Dataset of Misspellings and Grammatical Errors."](http://www.lrec-conf.org/proceedings/lrec2020/pdf/2020.lrec-1.835) Proceedings of the LREC 2020. LREC 1. Shun Kiyono, Jun Suzuki, Masato Mita, Tomoya Mizumoto, Kentaro Inui. ["An Empirical Study of Incorporating Pseudo Data to Grammatical Error Correction."](https://aclanthology.org/D19-1119/) Proceedings of EMNLP-IJCNLP 2019. EMNLP 1. Hiroki Asano, Masato Mita, Tomoya Mizumoto, Jun Suzuki. ["The AIP-Tohoku System at the BEA-2019 Shared Task."](https://aclanthology.org/W19-4418/) ACL Workshop BEA, 2019. BEA 1. Masato Mita, Tomoya Mizumoto, Masahiro Kaneko, Ryo Nagata, Kentaro Inui. ["Cross-Corpora Evaluation and Analysis of Grammatical Error Correction Models — Is Single-Corpus Evaluation Enough?."](https://aclanthology.org/N19-1132/) Proceedings of the NAACL-HLT 2019. NAACL 1. Tomoya Mizumoto, Masato Mita, Yuji Matsumoto. ["Grammatical Error Correction Considering Multi-word Expressions."](https://aclanthology.org/W15-4412/) ACL-IJCNLP Workshop TEA. TEA ## Non-refereed 1. Masato Mita, Keisuke Sakaguchi, Masato Hagiwara, Tomoya Mizumoto, Jun Suzuki, Kentaro Inui. ["Towards Automated Document Revision: Grammatical Error Correction, Fluency Edits, and Beyond."](https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.11484) arXiv:2205.11484. 2. Ryo Nagata, Masato Hagiwara, Kazuaki Hanawa, Masato Mita. ["A Report on FCG GenChal 2022: Shared Task on Feedback Comment Generation for Language Learners."](https://sigdialinlg2023.github.io/static/papers/genchal/130.pdf) Proceedings of the INLG 2023. 3. Masato Mita, Soichiro Murakami, Akihiko Kato, Peinan Zhang. ["CAMERA: A Multimodal Dataset and Benchmark for Ad Text Generation."](https://arxiv.org/abs/2309.12030) arXiv:2309.12030. ::: See also [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=fkWeWrwAAAAJ&hl=en) and [ACL Anthology](https://aclanthology.org/people/m/masato-mita/). ## Work Experience - 2022.6 - Current CyberAgent, Inc. Research Scientist - 2021.10 - Current Tokyo Metropolitan University, Project Assistant Professor (PI: Dr. Mamoru Komachi) - 2019.10 - 2020.12 Megagon Labs Japan (formerly Recruit Institute of Technology), Contract Researcher - 2018.2 - 2022.5 RIKEN Center for Advanced Intelligence Project (AIP), Researcher - 2016.4 - 2018.1 Microsoft Japan, Engineer - 2015.10 - 2015.12 Rakuten Institute of Technology - New York (RIT-NY), Research Intern (Mentor: Dr. Koji Murakami) - 2014.8 - 2014.8 NTT Communication Science Laboratories, Research Intern (Mentor: Dr. Katsuhito Sudoh) ## Education - 2018.10 - 2021.9 Ph.D. in Information Science, Tohoku University (Supervisor: Prof. Kentaro Inui) - 2014.4 - 2016.3 M.S. in Engineering, Nara Institute of Science and Technology (Supervisor: Prof. Yuji Matsumoto) - 2010.4 - 2014.3 B.A. , Prefectural University of Hiroshima
